name: PAT_COB_INFO
description: This table contains a list of coordination of benefits savings bucket (COB) coverages to which a member belongs, and information specific to that COB coverage, such as insurance company and subscriber name.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Unique patient ID associated with the Coordination of Benefits (COB) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line number of Coordination of Benefits (COB) information on patient.

columns.name: COB_INS_CO_NAME
columns.description: Name of the insurance company for Coordination of Benefits (COB) information.

columns.name: COB_INS_CO_ADDR
columns.description: Address of insurance company for Coordination of Benefits (COB) information.

columns.name: COB_INSURED_NAME
columns.description: Name of subscriber on Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_GRP_POLICY_NUM
columns.description: Group/policy number on Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_GRP_NAME_EMPR
columns.description: Group/employer name on Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of information for a member/Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_INS_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number of contact at Coordination of Benefits (COB) insurance company.

columns.name: COB_INS_CONTACT
columns.description: Contact at Coordination of Benefits (COB) insurance company.

columns.name: COB_INSURED_DOB
columns.description: Date of birth for subscriber on a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEM_RELX_C_NAME
columns.description: Relationship of member to the subscriber on a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEM_EFF_DATE
columns.description: Effective date of member on a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEM_TERM_DATE
columns.description: Termination date for a member on a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEM_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text comment for a member on a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage (member-level).

columns.name: COB_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text comment associated with a Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage (coverage-level).

columns.name: COB_MEM_PRI_YN
columns.description: Indicates if the Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage should be considered primary for the member (Y=COB coverage is primary, N=COB coverage is not primary).

columns.name: COB_MEMBERS
columns.description: Returns internal member IDs associated with Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_PART_D_RX_BIN
columns.description: The Beneficiary Identification Number (BIN) used for Part D Coordination of Benefits

columns.name: COB_PART_D_RX_PCN
columns.description: The Processor Control Number (PCN) used for Part D Coordination of Benefits

columns.name: COB_PART_D_RX_GRP
columns.description: The group used for Part D Coordination of Benefits

columns.name: COB_PART_D_RX_ID
columns.description: The ID used for Part D Coordination of Benefits

columns.name: COB_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the indemnity coverage that is associated with this Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_SUB_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The employment status of the subscriber on this Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEM_COURT_DECREE_C_NAME
columns.description: The court decree for the member on this Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.
entries: Not Applicable (no court decree concerning healthcare expenses)
Subscriber is the parent responsible for healthcare expenses
Subscriber is the spouse of the parent responsible for healthcare expenses
Subscriber is a parent jointly responsible for healthcare expenses
Subscriber is the spouse of a parent jointly responsible for healthcare expenses
Subscriber is the parent not responsible for healthcare expenses
Subscriber is the spouse of the parent not responsible for healthcare expenses

columns.name: COB_MEM_SUB_CUSTODY_C_NAME
columns.description: The subscriber custody for the member on this Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage.
entries: Not Applicable (parents married, widowed parent, etc)
Subscriber is a joint custody parent
Subscriber is the spouse of the custodial parent
Subscriber is the spouse of a joint custody parent
Subscriber is the spouse of the non-custodial parent

columns.name: COB_SUBSCRIBER_NUM
columns.description: The identifier for Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverages that is shared by all members on the same coverage.

columns.name: COB_MEMBER_NUM
columns.description: Coordination of Benefits (COB) member identification number.
